Package com.code.aon.ui.form

Basic classes to implement custom Controllers.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IController Interface to define data processing methods for the controllers.
IDataModelDataProvider Interface to define search methods for the DataModel classes.
ISearchable Interface to define search methods for the controllers.
 

Class Summary
AbstractPojoController Abstract POJO Controller.
AttachmentController Controller use to handle attachments.
BasicController Controller for Basic Structures.
EnviromentController Environment Controller.
FileBean Bean for files.
FileDownloadBean Bean for downloading files.
GridController Controller for grid maintenances.
LinesController LinesController is used to implement child Controllers.
LookupController  
NewWindowController Deprecated.
Page Page represents a part of the model that will be loaded.
PageDataModel DataModel that loads Pages to load objects.
RequestController Controller used to handle the request.
SelectWindowController Deprecated.
 

Package com.code.aon.ui.form Description

Basic classes to implement custom Controllers.

Since:
1.0
